text: Marlene Ahrens Ostertag (July 27, 1933 – June 17, 2020) was a Chilean athlete.Sports Reference: Marlene Ahrens She won the silver medal in Javelin throw at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne with a distance of 50.38 metres.Marlene Ahrens: Siempre que representé a Chile lancé como dos metros más, Radio Cooperativa, May 16, 2005 She was the mother of the journalist Karin Ebensperger. She was born in Concepción, Chile. Ahrens died on June 17, 2020 in Santiago de Chile from heart failure, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Javelin throwers Category:Chilean athletes Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:Olympic medalists for Chile Category:People from Concepción
title: Marlene Ahrens
